mapper.select: SELECT HOTBILL_SEQ_NO ,USE_YYMM ,CTRT_ID ,#{billYymm} AS BILL_YYMM ,#{billCycl} AS BILL_CYCL ,#{billDt} AS BILL_DT ,BILL_MM_TP ,SO_ID ,PYM_ACNT_ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.HOTBILL_SEQ_NO ,A.USE_YYMM ,A.CTRT_ID ,A.BILL_MM_TP ,A.SO_ID ,A.PYM_ACNT_ID FROM TBLIV_HOT_BILL A, TBLCH_MULTI_SEQ Z WHERE A.USE_YYMM = #{useYymm} AND A.BILL_MM_TP = '1' AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.GUBUN = '2' AND Z.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID >= Z.STRT_NO AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID <= Z.END_NO ) GROUP BY HOTBILL_SEQ_NO ,USE_YYMM ,CTRT_ID ,BILL_MM_TP ,SO_ID ,PYM_ACNT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBLIV_HOT_BILL_EXCP ( BILL_SEQ_NO ,USE_YYMM ,PROD_CMPS_ID ,SVC_CMPS_ID ,CHRG_ITM_CD ,BILL_YYMM ,BILL_CYCL ,BILL_DT ,SO_ID ,GRP_ID ,PYM_ACNT_ID ,CUST_ID ,CTRT_ID ,PROD_CD ,SVC_CD ,BIZ_CL ,PROD_GRP ,SVC_GRP ,BILL_MM_TP ,SALE_TP ,USG_CNT ,USG_AMT ,ADJ_PRV_BILL_AMT ,ADJ_AMT ,BILL_AMT ,PAY_DUE_DT ,ATRT_CORP_ID ,ATRT_EMP_ID ,WON_BILL_AMT ,CRNCY_CD ,EXRATE ,EXRATE_APLY_DT ,HOTBILL_SEQ_NO ,REG_DATE ) ( SELECT /* INDEX(A LSR_IDX1) */ A.BILL_SEQ_NO ,A.USE_YYMM ,A.PROD_CMPS_ID ,A.SVC_CMPS_ID ,A.CHRG_ITM_CD ,A.BILL_YYMM ,A.BILL_CYCL ,A.BILL_DT ,A.SO_ID ,A.GRP_ID ,A.PYM_ACNT_ID ,A.CUST_ID ,A.CTRT_ID ,A.PROD_CD ,A.SVC_CD ,A.BIZ_CL ,A.PROD_GRP ,A.SVC_GRP ,A.BILL_MM_TP ,A.SALE_TP ,A.USG_CNT ,A.USG_AMT ,A.ADJ_PRV_BILL_AMT ,A.ADJ_AMT ,A.BILL_AMT ,A.PAY_DUE_DT ,A.ATRT_CORP_ID ,A.ATRT_EMP_ID ,A.WON_BILL_AMT ,A.CRNCY_CD ,A.EXRATE ,A.EXRATE_APLY_DT ,#{hotbillSeqNo} ,#{regDate} FROM TBLIV_BILL_WRK A, TBLCH_MULTI_SEQ Z WHERE A.BILL_SEQ_NO = #{billSeqNo} AND A.USE_YYMM = #{useYymm} AND A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} AND A.CTRT_ID = #{ctrtId} AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.GUBUN = '2' AND Z.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID >= Z.STRT_NO AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID <= Z.END_NO )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(b.HOTBILL_SEQ_NO,a.HOTBILL_SEQ_NO) AS HOTBILL_SEQ_NO ,NVL(b.USE_YYMM,a.USE_YYMM) AS USE_YYMM ,NVL(b.PROD_CMPS_ID,a.PROD_CMPS_ID) AS PROD_CMPS_ID ,NVL(b.SVC_CMPS_ID,a.SVC_CMPS_ID) AS SVC_CMPS_ID ,NVL(b.CHRG_ITM_CD,a.CHRG_ITM_CD) AS CHRG_ITM_CD ,NVL(b.BILL_YYMM,#{billYymm}) AS BILL_YYMM ,NVL(b.BILL_CYCL,#{billCycl}) AS BILL_CYCL ,NVL(b.BILL_DT,#{billDt}) AS BILL_DT ,NVL(b.SO_ID,a.SO_ID) AS SO_ID ,NVL(b.GRP_ID,a.GRP_ID) AS GRP_ID ,NVL(b.PYM_ACNT_ID,a.PYM_ACNT_ID) AS PYM_ACNT_ID ,NVL(b.CUST_ID,a.CUST_ID) AS CUST_ID ,NVL(b.CTRT_ID,a.CTRT_ID) AS CTRT_ID ,NVL(b.PROD_CD,a.PROD_CD) AS PROD_CD ,NVL(b.SVC_CD,a.SVC_CD) AS SVC_CD ,NVL(b.BIZ_CL,a.BIZ_CL) AS BIZ_CL ,NVL(b.PROD_GRP,a.PROD_GRP) AS PROD_GRP ,NVL(b.SVC_GRP,a.SVC_GRP) AS SVC_GRP ,NVL(b.BILL_MM_TP,a.BILL_MM_TP) AS BILL_MM_TP ,NVL(b.SALE_TP,a.SALE_TP) AS SALE_TP ,NVL(b.USG_CNT,a.USG_CNT) AS USG_CNT ,NVL(b.USG_AMT,a.USG_AMT) AS USG_AMT ,NVL(b.BILL_AMT,0) - NVL(a.BILL_AMT,0) AS BILL_AMT ,NVL(b.PAY_DUE_DT,#{payDueDt}) AS PAY_DUE_DT ,NVL(b.BILL_SEQ_NO,a.BILL_SEQ_NO) AS BILL_SEQ_NO ,NVL(b.ATRT_CORP_ID,a.ATRT_CORP_ID) AS ATRT_CORP_ID ,NVL(b.ATRT_EMP_ID,a.ATRT_EMP_ID) AS ATRT_EMP_ID ,NVL(b.WON_BILL_AMT,0) - NVL(a.WON_BILL_AMT,0) AS WON_BILL_AMT ,NVL(b.CRNCY_CD,a.CRNCY_CD) AS CRNCY_CD ,NVL(b.EXRATE,a.EXRATE) AS EXRATE ,NVL(b.EXRATE_APLY_DT,a.EXRATE_APLY_DT) AS EXRATE_APLY_DT FROM (SELECT A.* FROM TBLIV_HOT_BILL A, TBLCH_MULTI_SEQ Z WHERE A.CHRG_ITM_CD NOT IN (SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD FROM IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_INFO WHERE CHRG_CTGRY IN ('N','Z') AND SO_ID = #{soId} ) AND A.BILL_DT <= (SELECT #{billYymm}||TRIM(SET_VAL) FROM TBLIV_BILL_CYCL_STP WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} AND BILL_CYCL = '01' AND SET_ITM_ID = '00055' AND ROWNUM = 1) AND A.USE_YYMM = #{useYymm} AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.GUBUN = '2' AND Z.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID >= Z.STRT_NO AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID <= Z.END_NO ) a FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.* FROM TBLIV_HOT_BILL_EXCP A, TBLCH_MULTI_SEQ Z WHERE A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.GUBUN = '2' AND Z.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID >= Z.STRT_NO AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID <= Z.END_NO ) b ON a.USE_YYMM >= #{useYymm} AND b.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} AND a.PYM_ACNT_ID = b.PYM_ACNT_ID AND a.USE_YYMM = b.USE_YYMM AND a.SO_ID = b.SO_ID AND a.PROD_CMPS_ID = b.PROD_CMPS_ID AND a.SVC_CMPS_ID = b.SVC_CMPS_ID AND a.CHRG_ITM_CD = b.CHRG_ITM_CD WHERE NVL(b.BILL_AMT,0) - NVL(a.BILL_AMT,0) != 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHECK_HOTBILL_DATE SELECT #{billYymm} ,#{checkDt} ,CTRT_ID ,SUM(BILL_AMT) FROM TBLIV_HOT_BILL A, TBLCH_MULTI_SEQ Z WHERE A.USE_YYMM = #{useYymm} AND A.CHRG_ITM_CD NOT IN ( SELECT SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD FROM IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_INFO WHERE CHRG_CTGRY = 'Z' AND SO_ID = #{soId} ) AND SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.GUBUN = '2' AND Z.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID >= Z.STRT_NO AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID <= Z.END_NO GROUP BY A.CTRT_ID
